name: UpdateCommunicationDetails
description:
Update communication object details in HubSpot CRM.

Perform a partial update of a HubSpot CRM communication object using its `communicationId` or a unique property value. This tool overwrites provided property values, with errors for read-only or non-existent properties.

parameters.name: communication_id
parameters.description: The internal object ID of the communication. Used to identify which communication object to update.

parameters.name: update_properties
parameters.description: JSON key-value pairs representing the properties of the communication object to be updated. Read-only and non-existent properties will result in an error. Pass an empty string to clear a property value.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: The unique property name used to identify the communication object if not using `communicationId`. It must refer to a property with unique values for the object.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
